channel.title: Error connecting / server offline
channel.description: every time i change the ip to my no-ip, i can never get on, but i hear people all the time saying that you need your to have ip to 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 or whatever, but i dont understand how people can connect if they aren't using your no-ip? if someone could please help me. itd be much appreciated. -i have teamview too.

item.title: Error connecting / server offline
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

i did that, theres no GUI in this client… and its still saying connection error =/ i left 1 of the things that was 127.0.0.1 alone and only changed the no-ip that was there before to mine.

if someone could please tv me and tell me whats wrong thatd help =/ thanks guys tho for the help

Read full topic

Do not change it in Server files, only Client sided. clienta.java

Both, in Client.Java Gui.Java

all of your friends use the IP: youriphere.no-ip.org or W.E

then u use 127.0.0.1

item.title: Error connecting / server offline
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

Okay, so Other players login using your no-ip. Not you, OTHER players.
YOU login using 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 . YOU do NOT login using your no-ip.

Read full topic
